reviewText: I purchased these DVDs as a gift for my father and was unsure what exactly I was getting because I myself do not speak Spanish, but I did recognize the actors. I received every movie as listed and they were well packaged. There was some issue with the post office that was resolved quickly by the seller. I am very happy with my purchase; my father had a great Father's Day and according to him, they're all great movies!
I love this movies got it for my girl she loved it too. its a good movie for the price
